title: PIXEL SERVICE CENTER INDIA
content: My GOOGLE PIXEL 3's  bottom speaker has stopped working altogether. I tried resetting the phone and all other troubleshooting steps as mentioned by the support team. My phone is under warranty. I want to send my phone to the service center in India and get it repaired soon, but there seems to be no way that I can get connected to the support team. Kindly help me over this urgent issue.
